content.raw:
I'm going to object. 

We've got to have a freeze on changes, especially this kind where new obstacles, literally and figuratively, are introduced into the competition. 

Additionally, the simulation is already getting bogged down tremendously by all the new features. My ratio goes from around 0.3 to 0.1 when all three tasks scenarios are in the world.
